metas.name: description
metas.content: Coding Blocks is the best live classes institute in India. Join beginner and advanced courses in C++, Java, Python, Machine learning, Data science, Web development, Android using Kotlin, Interview preparation for jobs and many more.

openGraph.title: Live classes for Covid-19 phase for students | Exact replica of Classroom courses | Coding Blocks
openGraph.description: Coding Blocks is the best live classes institute in India. Join beginner and advanced courses in C++, Java, Python, Machine learning, Data science, Web development, Android using Kotlin, Interview preparation for jobs and many more.

overview.content:
COVID-19 has hit the entire world pretty badly and has disrupted almost all realms of life, including education. With all educational institutions being shut for a fairly long time, students are losing precious time which was meant for education.

So what if students cannot come to the classrooms, Coding blocks will take the classrooms to the home of students. Presenting Live classes by Coding Blocks, a whole new way to learn from your home by your favorite teachers. Live class programs are just Classroom courses, just that you can attend the classes without having to travel to the center. Weekly schedule, timing, Mentor, Course schedule, everything is the same as Classroom program. The Mentor takes live classes at the scheduled date and time, students attend the sessions, skillify themselves, ask their doubts and get prepped up. Since the classes are two way interactive, you can see the teacher and can ask your doubts anytime you need during the session. Whatâ€™s more, each class is recorded and given to you for later reference.

Live classes are a version of your classroom program with added benefits like saving the travel time each day, access to recorded video of each class, live doubt resolution when you study and many many more.

The first batch of Live classes for all programs at Coding Blocks will start on 6th April 2020. These live classes are specially being introduced to ensure students do not lose on their education and skillify themselves well in time.

studentsSay.name: Anshul Mittal
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks helped in gaining enough experience to get internships at giants like Google and Rubrik.

studentsSay.name: Sidharth Bansal
studentsSay.story: Hii I am Sidharth Bansal from Delhi technology university. I have done competitive boot camp from coding blocks. This gave me a great exposure to problem solving mindset.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

faqs.ques: Why should i choose Live courses for learning?
faqs.ans: Live courses are the closest similarity to the Classroom programs in this pandemic. All advantages of Classroom program viz personalised attention, classes on fixed schedule, specific focus on hands-on coding, placement assistance, special Doubt classes and problem solving classes and much more will be provided to the students opting for this mode.

There are no prerequisites for training in C++, Java or Python. As these courses are for students who are just starting their journey in coding so student needs willingness and enthusiasm. Everything that you need to know about Programming would be taught from scratch.

faqs.ques: For Machine Learning and Data Science
faqs.ans: Student needs to know basics of programming in Python. We will cover Python fundamentals but for revision purpose only. In this course, our focus will be on the algorithms of Machine Learning and Data Science.

faqs.ques: Will Data Structures be covered in C++ or Java course?
faqs.ans: We will cover Data Structures and Algorithms in details in C++ and Java course. We will have 45 lectures on DS & Algo

faqs.ques: Will there be any projects covered in the course?
faqs.ans: We will have around 4-5 projects in each course. Please check the course syllabus for details

faqs.ques: I am new to the World of Coding, which course is best for me?
faqs.ans: To get enrolled in the most suitable course, based on your profile, we suggest you to talk to one of our counsellor. Please feel free to call us at 9999579111
